Type Property# urlRepresentation

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
static var urlRepresentation: Self.URLRepresentation { get }
```

Available when `Self` conforms to `OpenIntent` and `Value` conforms to `URLRepresentableEntity`.
